comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when delete a style which have been applied to toc.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070920-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a label with TOC "Label" and a style "Style1", 
   apply "Style1" to "Label1".
2. Delete "Style1", "Reference Found" dialogue pops up and click "Yes" button.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
